title: Will anyone buy the future iterations of iPhones, since they keep getting more and more expensive? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can consider Apple belonging to Oligopoly or close to Monopoly . Where the market is dominated by a few huge sellers . Due to this, apples reach ,and apples die heart followers , there will always be demand for apple products . But that doesn’t disprove the fact higher prices will affect the decrease in sales overall as it has been happening recently .
Some people will buy, but overall market share will decline due to the prices are getting higher without major improvements.
